verses.verse: אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> I [am] the man רָאָ֣ה <WH7200> [that] hath seen עֳנִ֔י <WH6040> affliction בְּשֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> by the rod עֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5678> of his wrath
אוֹתִ֥י <WH853> נָהַ֛ג <WH5090> He hath led וַיֹּלַ֖ךְ <WH1980> walk חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <WH2822> [me into] darkness וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not אֽוֹר׃ <WH216> but not [into] light
אַ֣ךְ <WH389> Surely בִּ֥י יָשֻׁ֛ב <WH7725> Surely against me is he turned יַהֲפֹ֥ךְ <WH2015> he turneth יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> [against me] all the day ס
בִּלָּ֤ה <WH1086> hath he made old בְשָׂרִי֙ <WH1320> My flesh וְעוֹרִ֔י <WH5785> and my skin שִׁבַּ֖ר <WH7665> he hath broken עַצְמוֹתָֽי׃ <WH6106> my bones
בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> He hath builded against עָלַ֛י <WH5921> and וַיַּקַּ֖ף <WH5362> me and compassed רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7219> [me] with gall וּתְלָאָֽה׃ <WH8513> and travail
בְּמַחֲשַׁכִּ֥ים <WH4285> me in dark places הוֹשִׁיבַ֖נִי <WH3427> He hath set כְּמֵתֵ֥י <WH4191> as [they that be] dead עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> of old ס
גָּדַ֧ר <WH1443> He hath hedged בַּעֲדִ֛י <WH1157> about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> cannot אֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> me about that I cannot get out הִכְבִּ֥יד <WH3513> heavy נְחָשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH5178> he hath made my chain
גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Even כִּ֤י <WH3588> when אֶזְעַק֙ <WH2199> Also when I cry וַאֲשַׁוֵּ֔עַ <WH7768> and shout שָׂתַ֖ם <WH5640> he shutteth out תְּפִלָּתִֽי׃ <WH8605> my prayer
גָּדַ֤ר <WH1443> He hath inclosed דְּרָכַי֙ <WH1870> my ways בְּגָזִ֔ית <WH1496> with hewn stone נְתִיבֹתַ֖י <WH5410> he hath made my paths עִוָּֽה׃ <WH5753> crooked ס
דֹּ֣ב <WH1677> He [was] unto me [as] a bear אֹרֵ֥ב <WH693> lying in wait הוּא֙ <WH1931> he לִ֔י [אַרְיֵה כ] (אֲרִ֖י <WH738> lion ק) בְּמִסְתָּרִֽים׃ <WH4565> in secret places
דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> my ways סוֹרֵ֛ר <WH5493> He hath turned aside וַֽיְפַשְּׁחֵ֖נִי <WH6582> and pulled me in pieces שָׂמַ֥נִי <WH7760> he hath made שֹׁמֵֽם׃ <WH8076> desolate
דָּרַ֤ךְ <WH1869> He hath bent קַשְׁתּוֹ֙ <WH7198> his bow וַיַּצִּיבֵ֔נִי <WH5324> and set כַּמַּטָּרָ֖א <WH4307> me as a mark לַחֵֽץ׃ <WH2671> for the arrow ס
הֵבִיא֙ <WH935> to enter בְּכִלְיוֹתָ֔י <WH3629> into my reins בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> He hath caused the arrows אַשְׁפָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH827> of his quiver

הָיִ֤יתִי <WH1961> have become שְּׂחֹק֙ <WH7814> I was a derision לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> to all my people נְגִינָתָ֖ם <WH5058> [and] their song כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> all the day
הִשְׂבִּיעַ֥נִי <WH7646> He hath filled בַמְּרוֹרִ֖ים <WH4844> me with bitterness הִרְוַ֥נִי <WH7301> he hath made me drunken לַעֲנָֽה׃ <WH3939> with wormwood ס
וַיַּגְרֵ֤ס <WH1638> He hath also broken בֶּֽחָצָץ֙ <WH2687> with gravel stones שִׁנָּ֔י <WH8127> my teeth הִכְפִּישַׁ֖נִי <WH3728> he hath covered בָּאֵֽפֶר׃ <WH665> me with ashes
וַתִּזְנַ֧ח <WH2186> far off מִשָּׁל֛וֹם <WH7965> from peace נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my soul נָשִׁ֥יתִי <WH5382> I forgat טוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> prosperity
וָאֹמַר֙ <WH559> And I said אָבַ֣ד <WH6> is perished נִצְחִ֔י <WH5331> My strength וְתוֹחַלְתִּ֖י <WH8431> and my hope מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> from the LORD ס
זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remembering עָנְיִ֥י <WH6040> mine affliction וּמְרוּדִ֖י <WH4788> and my misery לַעֲנָ֥ה <WH3939> the wormwood וָרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7219> and the gall
זָכ֣וֹר <WH2142> hath [them] still תִּזְכּ֔וֹר <WH2142> in remembrance [וְתָשִׁיחַ כ] (וְתָשֹׁ֥וחַ <WH7743> bow down ק) עָלַ֖י <WH5921> within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> My soul
זֹ֛את <WH2063> I אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> This I recall אֶל־ <WH413> to לִבִּ֖י <WH3820> to my mind עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that אוֹחִֽיל׃ <WH3176> therefore have I hope ס

חַֽסְדֵ֤י <WH2617> mercies יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> [It is of] the LORD'S כִּ֣י <WH3588> indeed לֹא־ <WH3808> never תָ֔מְנוּ <WH8552> that we are not consumed כִּ֥י <WH3588> indeed לֹא־ <WH3808> never כָל֖וּ <WH3615> fail רַחֲמָֽיו׃ <WH7356> because his compassions
חֲדָשִׁים֙ <WH2319> [They are] new לַבְּקָרִ֔ים <WH1242> every morning רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> great אֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH530> [is] thy faithfulness

חֶלְקִ֤י <WH2506> [is] my portion יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD אָמְרָ֣ה <WH559> saith נַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> my soul עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that אוֹחִ֥יל <WH3176> therefore will I hope לֽוֹ׃ ס
ט֤וֹב <WH2896> [is] good יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD לְקֹוָ֔ו <WH6960> unto them that wait לְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> for him to the soul תִּדְרְשֶֽׁנּוּ׃ <WH1875> [that] seeketh
ט֤וֹב <WH2896> [It is] good וְיָחִיל֙ <WH2342> bear וְדוּמָ֔ם <WH1748> and quietly wait לִתְשׁוּעַ֖ת <WH8668> for the salvation יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD
ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [It is] good לַגֶּ֔בֶר <WH1397> for a man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> should יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> that he bear עֹ֖ל <WH5923> the yoke בִּנְעוּרָֽיו׃ <WH5271> in his youth ס
יֵשֵׁ֤ב <WH3427> He sitteth בָּדָד֙ <WH910> alone וְיִדֹּ֔ם <WH1826> and keepeth silence כִּ֥י <WH3588> Since נָטַ֖ל <WH5190> because he hath borne עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and
יִתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> He putteth בֶּֽעָפָר֙ <WH6083> in the dust פִּ֔יהוּ <WH6310> his mouth אוּלַ֖י <WH194> Perhaps יֵ֥שׁ <WH3426> if so be there may be תִּקְוָֽה׃ <WH8615> hope
יִתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> He giveth לְמַכֵּ֛הוּ <WH5221> to him that smiteth לֶ֖חִי <WH3895> [his] cheek יִשְׂבַּ֥ע <WH7646> him he is filled full בְּחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> with reproach ס
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יִזְנַ֛ח <WH2186> will not cast off לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever אֲדֹנָֽי׃ <WH136> For the Lord

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For אִם־ <WH518> if הוֹגָ֔ה <WH3013> But though he cause grief וְרִחַ֖ם <WH7355> yet will he have compassion כְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> according to the multitude [חַסְדֹּו כ] (חֲסָדָֽיו׃ <WH2617> favour ק)
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> does not עִנָּה֙ <WH6031> For he doth not afflict מִלִּבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> willingly וַיַּגֶּ֖ה <WH3013> nor grieve בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> of men ס
לְדַכֵּא֙ <WH1792> To crush תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under רַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> under his feet כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> All אֲסִ֥ירֵי <WH615> all the prisoners אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
לְהַטּוֹת֙ <WH5186> To turn aside מִשְׁפַּט־ <WH4941> the right גָּ֔בֶר <WH1397> of a man נֶ֖גֶד <WH5048> In פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before the face עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> of the most High
לְעַוֵּ֤ת <WH5791> To subvert אָדָם֙ <WH120> a man בְּרִיב֔וֹ <WH7379> in his cause אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> the Lord לֹ֥א <WH3808> does not רָאָֽה׃ <WH7200> approveth ס

מִ֣י <WH4310> Who זֶ֤ה <WH2088> is there אָמַר֙ <WH559> Who [is] he [that] saith וַתֶּ֔הִי <WH1961> comes אֲדֹנָ֖י <WH136> and it cometh to pass [when] the Lord לֹ֥א <WH3808> Unless צִוָּֽה׃ <WH6680> commandeth
מִפִּ֤י <WH6310> Out of the mouth עֶלְיוֹן֙ <WH5945> of the most High לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> proceedeth הָרָע֖וֹת <WH7451> not evil וְהַטּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> good
מַה־ <WH4100> Why יִּתְאוֹנֵן֙ <WH596> complain אָדָ֣ם <WH120> man חָ֔י <WH2416> Wherefore doth a living גֶּ֖בֶר <WH1397> a man עַל־ <WH5921> view [חֶטְאֹו כ] (חֲטָאָֽיו׃ <WH2399> fault ק) ס
נַחְפְּשָׂ֤ה <WH2664> Let us search דְרָכֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH1870> our ways וְֽנַחְקֹ֔רָה <WH2713> and try וְנָשׁ֖וּבָה <WH7725> and turn again עַד־ <WH5704> against יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> to the LORD

נִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> Let us lift up לְבָבֵ֙נוּ֙ <WH3824> our heart אֶל־ <WH413> Toward כַּפָּ֔יִם <WH3709> with [our] hands אֶל־ <WH413> Toward אֵ֖ל <WH410> unto God בַּשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> in the heavens
נַ֤חְנוּ <WH5168> We פָשַׁ֙עְנוּ֙ <WH6586> have transgressed וּמָרִ֔ינוּ <WH4784> and have rebelled אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not סָלָֽחְתָּ׃ <WH5545> thou hast not pardoned ס

סַכֹּ֤תָה <WH5526> Thou hast covered בָאַף֙ <WH639> with anger וַֽתִּרְדְּפֵ֔נוּ <WH7291> and persecuted הָרַ֖גְתָּ <WH2026> us thou hast slain לֹ֥א <WH3808> have not חָמָֽלְתָּ׃ <WH2550> thou hast not pitied
סַכּ֤וֹתָה <WH5526> Thou hast covered בֶֽעָנָן֙ <WH6051> thyself with a cloud לָ֔ךְ מֵעֲב֖וֹר <WH5674> should not pass through תְּפִלָּֽה׃ <WH8605> that [our] prayer
סְחִ֧י <WH5501> us [as] the offscouring וּמָא֛וֹס <WH3973> and refuse תְּשִׂימֵ֖נוּ <WH7760> Thou hast made בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> in the midst הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> of the people ס
פָּצ֥וּ <WH6475> have opened עָלֵ֛ינוּ <WH5921> against פִּיהֶ֖ם <WH6310> their mouths כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <WH341> All our enemies
פַּ֧חַד <WH6343> Fear וָפַ֛חַת <WH6354> and a snare הָ֥יָה <WH1961> have befallen לָ֖נוּ הַשֵּׁ֥את <WH7612> is come upon us desolation וְהַשָּֽׁבֶר׃ <WH7667> and destruction

פַּלְגֵי־ <WH6388> with rivers מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> of water תֵּרַ֣ד <WH3381> runneth down עֵינִ֔י <WH5869> Mine eye עַל־ <WH5921> Because שֶׁ֖בֶר <WH7667> for the destruction בַּת־ <WH1323> of the daughter עַמִּֽי׃ <WH5971> of my people ס
עֵינִ֧י <WH5869> Mine eye נִגְּרָ֛ה <WH5064> trickleth down וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִדְמֶ֖ה <WH1820> and ceaseth מֵאֵ֥ין <WH369> Without הֲפֻגֽוֹת׃ <WH2014> not without any intermission
עַד־ <WH5704> Until יַשְׁקִ֣יף <WH8259> look down וְיֵ֔רֶא <WH7200> and behold יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Till the LORD מִשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> from heaven
עֵינִי֙ <WH5869> Mine eye עֽוֹלְלָ֣ה <WH5953> affecteth לְנַפְשִׁ֔י <WH5315> mine heart מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> of all בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1323> because of all the daughters עִירִֽי׃ <WH5892> of my city ס
צ֥וֹד <WH6679> chased צָד֛וּנִי <WH6679> me sore כַּצִּפּ֖וֹר <WH6833> like a bird אֹיְבַ֥י <WH341> Mine enemies חִנָּֽם׃ <WH2600> without cause
צָֽמְת֤וּ <WH6789> They have cut off בַבּוֹר֙ <WH953> in the dungeon חַיָּ֔י <WH2416> my life וַיַּדּוּ־ <WH3034> and cast אֶ֖בֶן <WH68> a stone בִּֽי׃
צָֽפוּ־ <WH6687> flowed over מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Waters עַל־ <WH5921> over רֹאשִׁ֖י <WH7218> mine head אָמַ֥רְתִּי <WH559> [then] I said נִגְזָֽרְתִּי׃ <WH1504> I am cut off ס
קָרָ֤אתִי <WH7121> I called שִׁמְךָ֙ <WH8034> upon thy name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD מִבּ֖וֹר <WH953> dungeon תַּחְתִּיּֽוֹת׃ <WH8482> out of the low

קוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice שָׁמָ֑עְתָּ <WH8085> Thou hast heard אַל־ <WH408> not תַּעְלֵ֧ם <WH5956> hide אָזְנְךָ֛ <WH241> not thine ear לְרַוְחָתִ֖י <WH7309> at my breathing לְשַׁוְעָתִֽי׃ <WH7775> at my cry
קָרַ֙בְתָּ֙ <WH7126> Thou drewest near בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> in the day אֶקְרָאֶ֔ךָּ <WH7121> [that] I called אָמַ֖רְתָּ <WH559> upon thee thou saidst אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָֽא׃ <WH3372> Fear ס
רַ֧בְתָּ <WH7378> thou hast pleaded אֲדֹנָ֛י <WH136> O Lord רִיבֵ֥י <WH7379> the causes נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> of my soul גָּאַ֥לְתָּ <WH1350> thou hast redeemed חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> my life
רָאִ֤יתָה <WH7200> thou hast seen יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> O LORD עַוָּ֣תָתִ֔י <WH5792> my wrong שָׁפְטָ֖ה <WH8199> judge מִשְׁפָּטִֽי׃ <WH4941> thou my cause
רָאִ֙יתָה֙ <WH7200> Thou hast seen כָּל־ <WH3605> all נִקְמָתָ֔ם <WH5360> all their vengeance כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֖ם <WH4284> [and] all their imaginations לִֽי׃ ס
שָׁמַ֤עְתָּ <WH8085> Thou hast heard חֶרְפָּתָם֙ <WH2781> their reproach יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַחְשְׁבֹתָ֖ם <WH4284> [and] all their imaginations עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> against

שִׂפְתֵ֤י <WH8193> The lips קָמַי֙ <WH6965> of those that rose up וְהֶגְיוֹנָ֔ם <WH1902> against me and their device עָלַ֖י <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> against me all the day
שִׁבְתָּ֤ם <WH3427> their sitting down וְקִֽימָתָם֙ <WH7012> and their rising up הַבִּ֔יטָה <WH5027> Behold אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am מַנְגִּינָתָֽם׃ <WH4485> I [am] their musick ס
